title: Workshop on Developing Informal Learning Strategies for Practicing Instructional Designers: Strengthening CS Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theory and Over 3 Years of Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify five or more informal learning cases occurring in work environments.
Learners can structure learning conflicts arising during collaboration with peers using hermeneutic analysis techniques.
Learners can establish and implement three or more practical strategies to promote informal learning within an organization.
Learners can construct a self-directed learning portfolio and measure its impact on enhancing practical competencies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
